schedule: Asmara – Axum – Gondar – Bahar Dar – Addis Ababa
circumstances: On approach to Gondar Airport, the left wing detached. Out of control, the airplane dove into the ground and crashed few km from the airfield. All 11 occupants were killed.
probable_cause: It is believed that the physical loss of the right wing was caused by the presence of fatigue cracks in the root.
